
                            
                            <p>直播间3个时长福袋，红包雨，还有京东“逛”每天0.5元换1.5元直播红包。两三块钱红包很好凑。 <br>  <br> 转了一大圈，还是京东大药房直播间实用些，买些日常备用药，维生素。 <br>  <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/210453sb141101i7dfocb3.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/210453sb141101i7dfocb3.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/210453jxi06069xp0z06gz.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/210453jxi06069xp0z06gz.jpg"> <br> <img referrerpolicy=" " src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/210453s2dffn7t5221rf3z.jpg" data-fancybox="article-img" data-src="https://image.baidu.com/search/down?url=http://img.zuanke8.cn/forum/202504/26/210453s2dffn7t5221rf3z.jpg"> </p>
